item.title: DIY Google Ads Account Monitor With R, AdWords API, And Slack API
item.description: Every now and then I’m fortunate enough to be able to publish guest posts by illustrious people in the analytics and digital marketing industries. This time, I get to work with an old colleague of mine who’s a veritable wizard when it comes to building solutions that make our daily work in the digital industry so much smoother. Erik Gr√∂nroos works as an analyst in MarkkinointiAkatemia, a Finnish digital customer acquisition agency.
